name: KILLALL
description: AS A SPECIAL MARINE, YOU TRY TO FIGHT YOUR WAY OUT OF THE BUILDING OF DEMT. BUT EVERY WHERE YOU SEE IS ENEMY. SO YOU USE ALL YOUR RESOURCES TRY TO STAY ALIVE. IS NOT EASY. ONCE A MARINE SAID THAT "A MARINE IS READY TO KICK ASS ANYTIME, ANYDAY AND ANYWHERE, WELL THIS IS THE TIME AND THIS IS THE PLACE, SO SHOW THE DEMON WHAT A MARINE IS MADE OF AND IS TIME TO KICK ASS. BUT REMEMBER, YOU CAN USE THE ENEMY AS A HUMAN SHIELD AS MUCH AS POSSIBLE. HAPPY DOOMING AND REMEMBER EAT YOUR VEGGIES.
